name: Product Video Gallery for Woocommerce
author: NikHiL Gadhiya

sections.description:
Product Video Gallery for Woocommerce – Embed videos to product gallery along with images on product single page of WooCommerce.
You can add only one video to per product gallery on free version or you can mix video and images combine as product gallery.
Adding Product Video and Instantly transform the gallery on your WooCommerce Product page into a fully Responsive Stunning Carousel.
When user sees brief video of your product then chances to sell product increases and it will also good for marketing of product. The features of plugin are really cool and easy to use.
Product details page will show that gallery video.

Basic Features

  1. Embed YouTube video to product gallery along with images and video together in single product gallery.
  2. Supports all type YouTube video URL.
  3. Videos will show in the gallery if the product doesn’t have any image.
  4. images and video together in single product gallery.
  5. You can set Slider layout (Vertical or Horizontal), Slider auto play, Arrow enable/Disable for slider, Slider loop, Lightbox, Zoom, Arrow color, Arrow background color and many more options.
  6. Add the URL of YouTube video of Product in the specific field of the product configuration page and your customers will have the pleasure to watch something dynamic and customized.
  7. Adding Product Video and Instantly transform the gallery on your WooCommerce Product page into a fully Responsive Stunning Carousel
  8. RTL support

= Premium Features 💎=
01. You Can Use Vimeo And Html5 Video(MP4, WebM, and Ogg).
02. You Can Add Multiple Videos.
03. Change The Place Of The Video(After Product Gallery Images, After Product Image and Before Product Gallery Images).
04. Video Looping (Looping a video is allowing the video to play in a repeat mode).
05. Show Only Videos (Display only videos on gallery).
06. Shortcode [product_gallery_shortcode] (Use shortcode if your product pages edited with help of any page builders Divi Builder, Elementor Builder etc.).
Buy Premium
Before buying the paid plugin please make sure free version of our plugin works great. So you have an idea about the features of plugins and how it will works.

Support

For any queries feel free to drop a line at nikhilgadhiya7@gmail.com.

Setup and Configuration

Go to: Products > WC Product Video
Tick the checkbox to configure a setting.
Save changes

Usage

For adding a video to your product : open edit product page and insert your product YouTube video URL in {Product Video Url} field
sections.installation:
Automatic Installation

  • Go to your plugin browser inside your wordpress installation and search Product Video Gallery for Woocommerce by keyword. Then choose “Product Video Gallery for Woocommerce” and click install. It will be installed shortly.
  • Activate the plugin from Plugins menu after installation

Manual Installation

  • Download the latest version and extract the folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  • The plugin will appear as inactive in your Plugins menu
  • Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress

sections.reviews:
Perfect

By crossmaster on April 1, 2024

Everything works perfectly! simple and super effective. Video hosting is smooth and well configured.

I was even able to speak with the creator of the plugin about optimization for the video player and he was attentive and very responsive. Just perfect. THANKS. I recommend

Fantástico soporte técnico

By mariaherena on February 12, 2024

Este plugin era exactamente lo que estaba buscando. Añade en las miniaturas un vídeo, sin quitar la fotografía. Pero en principio me dio problemas porque en escritorio, desplazaba la columna de la derecha hacia abajo.

Escribí al soporte y en cuestión de horas me enviaron un código que después de implementarlo resolvió el problema. Solo tuve que añadir una excepción para el móvil y Tablet.

Super agradecida.

Works well (be careful with lazyload for thumbnails)

By justin77 on February 8, 2024

Great plugin but video schema throws warnings in google search console

El pluging hace lo que se le pide

By egomeman on February 5, 2024

El plugin funciona después de varias actualizaciones y corrección de errores que se ha tenido que implementar. Buen soporte para la resolución de problemas. Tiene un buen rendimiento

Excellent Plugin + Customer Support after Purchasing Subscription

By replikant84 on November 9, 2023

I bought the plugin, but was having some conflicting issues with my current shop theme, and I contacted Nikhil about a feature that would allow better functionality of this plugin, and within 24 hours, he had resolved the issue, and sent me a link to a custom updated version of the plugin that now functions perfect to my site. I highly recommend using this plugin if you easily want to just add Videos to any WooCommerce product listing. I love how easy it is to add a video to any page with the built in features that show up on the product page to easily link a self hosted, vimeo, or youtube video. Great work Nikhil!

Missing function to choose the position

By kawa8 on October 12, 2023

I really miss the function to choose the position of the video in the image gallery. Because if the product has more than 5 pictures the video becomes hard to find. It would be really great if it becomes possible to add video right after the first image or as a separate tab in the description (or even in the top of the main description area).

Amazing plugin!

By imran1999 on September 23, 2023

Product Video Gallery Slider for WooCommerce" is a top-notch WordPress plugin. The owner's exceptional customer support resolved installation issues promptly. The plugin effortlessly enhances product galleries with embedded videos, providing an engaging shopping experience. Its smooth and customizable slider functionality adapts seamlessly to your website design. A must-have tool for WooCommerce users looking to boost their online store's appeal. This plugin, backed by outstanding support, is a game-changer. Highly recommended!

Brilliant fast support for Pro version in Divi theme

By giraffe42 on September 17, 2023

I use the Divi theme with a lot of customisation, and my videos are on Vimeo, so I had to buy the Pro version. After some initial difficulty setting it up myself, the support provided was really responsive and I even received custom CSS to make the plugin work perfectly with my difficult settings. Very happy :)

Exceptionnal support and great plugin

By htagcom on September 13, 2023

Very reactive support with amazing help ! The plugin is now working as expected !

Great Plugin + support!

By jenbee on August 24, 2023

Top!
